contentList.content: Timeweaver's Set Bonus
Timeweaver's Set Bonus 0/4: There are no bonuses
Timeweaver's Set Bonus 2/4: There are no bonuses
Timeweaver's Set Bonus 4/4: You have achieved a wondrous mastery of time. You gain <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="VW_Chronoshift">Chronoshift</LSTag>. In addition you gain
Chronoshift

You lock yourself in time at the moment of casting and then teleport up to [1] away. For a duration of 3 rounds you may cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="VW_Chronoshift_Recall">Chronoshift Recall</LSTag> to return to that fixed point in time you created exactly as you were in the time of casting.
Chronoshift Recall
Return to the place you were upon casting <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="VW_Chronoshift">Chronoshift</LSTag> reversing any Hitpoints, SpellSlots and Statuses you lost while the duration lasts.
Velen's Robe

This exquisite robe, woven from ethereal strands that shimmer with a celestial glow, bears the unmistakable mark of Velen Lightsbane. Robe of the Timelord are a manifestation of the god's mastery over time itself. The fabric seems to dance with an otherworldly energy, and constellations subtly shift across its surface.
Aleria's Bracers
Bracers of Aleria Windrunner , mother of Velen and Lorenala , High Sorceress of Elendia. These Bracers are the epitome of her Mastery of the Weave.
Aleria's Blessing
Empowered by Aleria's Blessing giving you deeper access to your inner power and grants you the power to tap into the weave to gain +[1] <LSTag Tooltip="Sorcery Points">Max Sorcery Points</LSTag>.
Aleria's Weave Mastery
You gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> as long as you are not wearing armour or holding a shield.
Velen's Boots
Boots adorned with arcane symbols that seem to ripple with temporal energy. The leather is imbued with threads of magic that dance with the ebb and flow of time.
Time stands Still

Your mastery over time and space allows you to move faster gaining +[1] <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag>. In addition you gain an extra <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">reaction</LSTag>
Velen's Crown
A regal crown adorned with a central gem that captures the essence of a swirling cosmic nebula. The diadem hums with the power to manipulate time and space.
Echoes of Time

Wherever you cast a spell there is a 20% chance to create an echo of the spell you have just cast allowing you to cast it again for free. If you do not cast the echoed spell in this turn the echo dissipated into the weave.
Grovekeeper's Set Bonus
Grovekeeper's Set Bonus 0/4: There are no bonuses
Grovekeeper's Set Bonus 2/4: There are no bonuses
Grovekeeper's Set Bonus 4/4: There are no bonuses
Grovekeeper's Jacket
A verdant green jacket woven from enchanted vines and leaves. It emits a faint aroma of the forest and seems to pulse with the energy of nature.
Living Armor

While shapeshifted the armor melds with you enhancing your defensive capabilities. Your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">AC</LSTag> becomes 18. In Addition you become <LSTag Tooltip="Resistance">Resistant</LSTag> to Bludgeoning, Slashing, and Piercing damage from Weapons.
Chosen of Silvanus

You were chosen to be the Avatar of Silvanus to protect and keep the balance of nature in check.
Your wildshape now benefits from all equipped items and their effects.
Grovekeeper's Circlet
A delicate circlet adorned with leaves and small blossoms. It exudes a calming aura and enhances the wearer's connection to the natural world.
Nature's Cradle

While wearing Grovekeeper's Circlet you gain +[1] <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> up to a maximum of 22. In Addition, you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Nature">Nature</LSTag> skill checks and access to the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="VW_Verdant_Renewal">Verdant Renewal</LSTag> spell.
Verdant Renewal

You gather the power of nature and mend yourself and your allies for [1] <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>. In addition you gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="VW_STATUS_GROVES_EMBRACE">Grove's Embrace</LSTag> for [2] turn.
Grove's Embrace
While this effect lasts You and Your allies become <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to all damage for [1] round and gain +[2] <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag>
Grovekeeper's Gloves
Gloves made from supple leather and adorned with small runes resembling leaves. They offer both protection and a closer attunement to the druid's abilities.
Superior Natural Weapons
While Shapeshifted your natural weapon attacks are enhanced by an additional [1] damage.
Nature's Grace
Wherever you successfully heal someone they gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="VW_NATURES_BLOOM">Nature's Bloom</LSTag> effect for [1] turns.
Nature's Bloom
While under the effects of Nature's Bloom you gain +[1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> each turn for [2] turns.
Grovekeeper's Boots
Sturdy boots crafted from bark and moss, providing a strong connection to the earth. They allow the druid to move through natural environments with ease.
Path of the Grove
While enabled you leave behind you a patch of grasping vines to slow down your enemies.
DeathStalker's Set Bonus
DeathStalker's Set Bonus 0/4: There are no bonuses

DeathStalker's Set Bonus 2/4: When 2 of the 4 Deathstalker Pieces are equipped the wearer gains the following bonuses: <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="VW_SUPERIOR_ASSASSINATION">Superior Assassination</LSTag> and the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="VW_Shadow_Assault">Shadow Assault</LSTag> ability.

DeathStalker's Set Bonus 4/4: When all Deathstalker Pieces are equipped the wearer gains the following bonuses: <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Poison damage, the <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="VW_SUPERIOR_ASSASSINATION">Superior Assassination</LSTag> , the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="VW_Shadow_Assault">Shadow Assault</LSTag> and the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="VW_Death_Strike">Death Strike</LSTag> ability.
Superior Assassination
Whenever you score a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">critical hit</LSTag>, deal an additional [1].
Shadow Assault
Walk through the shadows appearing behind an enemy within [1] feet attempting to assassinate him. If the attack is successful it is considered a critical.
Death Strike
You strike your target through the shadows with such masterful precision that can die instantly if his <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> are less than 50.
DeathStalker's Cuirass

A shadow-infused chestplate that melds seamlessly with the rogue's movements, providing both protection and stealth. The cuirass is adorned with dark symbols that seem to pulse with a mysterious energy.
Deathstalker Set Bonus:
Deathstalker Set Bonus 2/4
Deathstalker Set Bonus 4/4
Only Equippable by a Rogue.
Master Assasin
You gain +[1] <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> up to a maximum of 22. In addition you become <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to necrotic damage.
DeathStalker's Deathmask
A finely crafted mask adorned with shadowy motifs and made from the hide of elusive creatures of the night. When worn, it seems to drink in the surrounding shadows. Only Equippable by a Rogue.
Shadow Killer

You can see normally in darkness, both magical and non-magical, to a distance of [1]. In addition, while hiding the number you need to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> while attacking is reduced by 2. This effect can stack
While hidden, the number you need to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> while attacking is reduced by 2. This effect can stack.
DeathStalker's Handguards
Sleek, black leather gloves adorned with intricate shadowy patterns. These handguards are tailored to enhance a rogue's agility and lethality. Only Equippable by a Rogue.
Poison Mastery

You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SleightOfHand">Sleight of Hand</LSTag> and deal +[2] damage. In addition the target needs to succeed a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoned</LSTag>.
DeathStalker's Boots
Boots forged from the shadows, these sleek and supple footwear blend seamlessly with the rogue's attire, emphasizing both style and functionality. Only Equippable by a Rogue.
Shadow Walker
You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Stealth">Stealth</LSTag> and increased <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> by [2].

Quel'Delar, a celestial weapon, was meticulously crafted by Tyralion Lightsbane in the ethereal realms. Infused with raw arcane power and adorned with potent runic markings, this legendary blade stands as a symbol of celestial might on the game's battlefield.
Quel'Delar
Lightbringer's Set Bonus
Lightbringer Set Bonus 0/4: There are no bonuses

Lightbringer Set Bonus 2/4: When 2 of the 4 Lightbringer Pieces are equipped the wearer gains the following bonuses: <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="VW_BLESSING_OF_LIGHT">Blessing of Light</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="VW_LIGHTWARDEN">Lightwarden</LSTag>

Lightbringer Set Bonus 4/4: When all Lightbringer Pieces are equipped the wearer gains the following bonuses: <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="VW_BLESSING_OF_LIGHT">Blessing of Light</LSTag> , the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="VW_LIGHTWARDEN">Lightwarden</LSTag> and the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="VW_Avatar_Of_Light">Avatar of Light</LSTag> spell.
Blessing of Light
The paladin and any nearby allies in [1] ft radius regain the maximum <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> possible when healed.
Blessing of Light Aura
The paladin and any nearby allies in [1] ft radius regain the maximum <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> possible when healed.
Avatar Of Light

You Become an Avatar of Light Healing yourself for [1] and your allies within [2] for [1] and then [1] each turn for [3] turns. In addition you sprout wings allowing you to fly and become resistant to all damage for the duration.
Avatar Of Light Healing
You Become an Avatar of Light Healing yourself for [1] and your allies within [2] for [1] and then [1] each turn for [3] turns.
Avatar of Light Divine Resistance
You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all types of damage.
Lightwarden
You gain +[1] <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="LayOnHandsCharge">Lay On Hands</LSTag> maximum charges.
Lightbringer Breastplate
Lightbringer's armor pieces gain power if you equip them as a set. Lightbringer Set Bonus: Lightbringer Set Bonus 2/4 Lightbringer Set Bonus 4/4 Only Equippable by a Paladin.
Lightbringer's Diadem
A unique Diadem created in the Astral forge by Lucilia Mornthal. It allows the wielder to draw power directly from the Celestial plane. Only Equippable by a Paladin.
Divine Halo

The wearer of the Diadem is infused with Pure Celestial Energy.Once per <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>, when your hit points are reduced to 0, you regain [2]. Allies within [1] also regain [3].
%%% Divine Halo Cooldown
%%% EMPTY
Lightbringer's Gauntlets

A unique pair of Gauntlets created in the Astral forge by Lucilia Mornthal. Their hardness is unrivaled and they can infuse the weapon they are holding with radiant power. Only Equippable by a Paladin.
Radiant Grip
The Gauntlets infuse the weapon of the wearer with +[1] damage.
Lightbringer's Greaves
A unique pair of Greaves created in the Astral forge by Lucilia Mornthal. They allow the wearer to become an immovable fortress to protect their allies. Only Equippable by a Paladin.
Immovable Force

The wearer becomes an immovable mountain and cannot be forcibly moved by a foe's spells or actions, and you ignore the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>. In addition, you cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralysed</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag>.
To Mpekatsoksulo einai to TOP MPEKATSOKSULO GIA MPEKATSOKSULIASMA
To Mpekatsoksulo
Vara me pathos, Vara me misos, Vara me to MPEKATSOKSULO
Ultimate Mpekatsoksuliasma
OTAN OLA PAN STRAVA, VARA STOU KEFAL
Mpekatsoksuliasma stou KEFAL
Arcane Bolts
Throw [2] Arcane Bolts that deal [1] damage each ignoring reistance.
Æthelion, The Holy Dawn, a weapon forge in the Astral forge by Aurelios Nelmar from Ætherite ore infused with raw celestial energy from the Celestial Plane.
Æthelion, The Holy Dawn
Attunement
Æthelion gets more powerful with its wielder: at higher levels adds bonus damage, unlocks more powerful skills and the ability to shed light.
The Holy Dawn
Sunlight Lightning Spear
Throws a conjured magical spear of Sunlight and Lightning dealing [1] damage and [2] damage and Stunning the target.
VW_Avatar_Of_Light_Cooldown
AVADA KEDAVRA

There was a flash of blinding green light and a rushing sound, as though a vast, invisible something was soaring through the air — instantaneously the spider rolled over onto its back, unmarked, but unmistakably dead. If by some miracle the target resists the spell he still takes 100 damage from the brute raw arcane energy that hitted him.
You must be a Paladin to equip this item.
You must be a Rogue to equip this item.
You must be a Druid to equip this item.
You must be a Sorcerer to equip this item.
